title: Employment Law Updates
summary: The newsletter covers employment law issues, including disability discrimination claims and garnishment laws. It also discusses new nondiscrimination statutes for public contracts, the formation of fire districts through resolutions, and the role of ex officio members.
compressed_content: 1. Employment law issues related to termination and disability claims. 2. Garnishment laws affecting public sector employees. 3. Updates on nondiscrimination statutes for contractors and unions. 4. Formation of fire districts through resolutions with specific requirements.
search_text:
Volume 23, Number 3
Disability Discrimination
Garnishment Primer
Nondiscrimination Statute Update
Ex Officio Designation
